title: Unit 4: My Neighbourhood - Comparative Adjectives & Directions

theory.brief: So sánh hơn (Comparative) dùng để so sánh 2 người/vật. Tính từ ngắn (1 âm tiết): thêm -er (bigger, taller). Tính từ dài (2+ âm tiết): more + tính từ (more beautiful, more expensive). Cấu trúc: A + be + adj-er/more adj + than + B. Chỉ đường: Go straight (đi thẳng), Turn left/right (rẽ trái/phải), Take the first/second turning (rẽ ở ngã rẽ thứ nhất/hai).
examples: My house is bigger than your house. (Nhà tôi lớn hơn nhà bạn.)
This street is more modern than that street. (Đường này hiện đại hơn đường kia.)
Go straight, then turn left. (Đi thẳng, sau đó rẽ trái.)
Take the second turning on the right. (Rẽ phải ở ngã rẽ thứ hai.)

exercises.question: My house is _______ (big) than yours.
This city is _______ (modern) than my hometown.
The streets here are _______ (narrow) than those in my city.
hints: Tính từ 2 âm tiết kết thúc bằng -ow thêm -er

exercises.question: Life in the country is _______ (peaceful) than life in the city.
The park is _______ (beautiful) than the square.
My neighbourhood is _______ (quiet) than your neighbourhood.
These shops are _______ (expensive) than those in the mall.
This building is _______ (tall) than that one.
The weather today is _______ (good) than yesterday.
My new school is _______ (far) than my old school.
Go _______, then turn left at the corner.
Turn _______ at the traffic lights.
_______ the road carefully.
Take the _______ turning on the left.
hints: số thứ tự: first, second, third

exercises.question: The post office is _______ your right.
A city house is _______ than a country house.
exercises.explanation: 'expensive' là tính từ dài, dùng 'more expensive'

exercises.question: The weather is _______ today than yesterday.
hints: 'bad' là tính từ bất quy tắc

exercises.question: This street is _______ than that street.
exercises.explanation: Tính từ 2 âm tiết kết thúc bằng -y, đổi y thành i và thêm -er
hints: Tính từ kết thúc bằng -y: noisy → noisier

exercises.question: Excuse me. Can you tell me the way _______ the post office?
exercises.explanation: Cấu trúc: the way to + địa điểm

exercises.question: Go straight, then _______ the first turning on the right.
exercises.explanation: Cấu trúc: take the first/second turning
hints: 'take the turning' = rẽ ở ngã rẽ
